Header: Newly- Appointed CTS Commandant Begins His Duties
Content: The newly-appointed Commandant, Combat Training School (CTS), Brigadier N. R Lamahewage assumed duties as the 38th Commandant on Thursday(10) at the Combat Training School Headquarters in Ampara. He was honoured by CTS troops on arrival in a Guard Turnout and a ceremonial parade before he signed an official document amid religious blessings, to symbolize his acceptance of the new office. By planting a Mango sapling in the premises afterwards he added memories. He later on addressed the troops. Lieutenant Colonel D.U.N Serasinha, Commanding Officer-CTS, Officers and Other Ranks in the Combat Training School attended the occasion.
